scripts.apply-version: echo $npm_package_version && find . -path ./node_modules -prune -o -name "*.js" -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i '' -e "s/const X_APP_VERSION \=.*/const X_APP_VERSION \= '$npm_package_version'/g"
scripts.rc: npm version patch && npm run apply-version && git commit -a -m 'release candidate' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
